mapper.update: MERGE INTO posts USING DUAL ON ( id = #{id} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, secret = #{isSecret} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id, title, content, secret) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, EMPTY_CLOB(), #{isSecret})
mapper.delete: UPDATE posts SET del_yn=1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, secret, created_at FROM posts WHERE id = #{id} AND del_yn=0
